A) JavaScript - top

This theme imports some well known Javascript files.

  1. jQuery framework: http://jquery.com/
  2. jQuery Tools Plugin: http://flowplayer.org/tools/index.html
  3. jQuery Easing Plugin: http://gsgd.co.uk/sandbox/jquery/easing/
  4. jQuery Cycle Plugin: http://jquery.malsup.com/cycle/
  5. jQuery Cloud Zoom Plugin: http://www.professorcloud.com/mainsite/cloud-zoom.htm

B) PSD Files - top

There are following layered PSD files included with this theme:

  1. Main.psd - The main layout
  2. Pix.psd - The main image sprite
  3. Icons.psd - The icons
  4. Slideshow-Arrows.psd - Arrows used in slideshow
  5. Tab-Pager.psd - Pager buttons used in slideshow
  1. File is divided into sections corresponding to store sections, e.g. header, product page, footer etc. Each section is in a separate folder with upper-case name.
    Some sections are duplicated to create some additional color skins:
    • NAV - main navigation bar
    • HEADER - store header
    These sections are named like this: "SECTION - color_name", e.g. "NAV - blue". Enable one of those additional sections to change the color of the design.
  2. File contains main images merged into one file. You can easily change colors of many elements of the theme. Just make the necessary adjustments, and then save the file as "pix.png". Remember to keep the background transparent.
  3. File contains the most important icons. You can easily change colors of these icons or replace them with your own icons. Just make the necessary adjustments, and then save the file as "icons.png". Remember to keep the background transparent.
  4. After any necessary adjustments, save the file as "slideshow-arrows.png". Remember to keep the background transparent.
  5. After any necessary adjustments, save the file as "tab-pager-ring-lgray.png". Remember to keep the background transparent.
